did.abstract: Miriam Sargeant Packard traced her family back to the Mayflower. Occupations of family members included sea captains and sailors, as well as housewives, farmers, stock brokers, realtors, and dealers in hardware and building materials. This collection includes family genealogies and biographical information, diaries, and correspondence of multiple generations of the Howland, Packard, and Sargeant families.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Miriam Sargeant Packard's family surnames include Howland, Sargeant, Packard, Hill, Peirce and Spooner. Her forebear, Richard Warren, came to America on the Mayflower. The families lived primarily in eastern Massachusetts, including New Bedford. Occupations of family members included sea captains and sailors, as well as housewives, farmers, stock brokers, realtors, and dealers in hardware and building materials.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
